com.deezer.sdk.player.event

Interface PlayerWrapperListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    RadioPlayerListener

    public interface PlayerWrapperListener
    Defines the behavior of a listener of the PlayerWrapper's events. It will be notified of playback changes in the PlayerWrapper as well as errors when communicating with Deezer API.
    Author:
    Deezer

    • Method Summary

      • onRequestIOException

        void onRequestIOException(java.io.IOException exception,
                        java.lang.Object requestId)
        Called when a request has a network error
        Parameters:
        exception - the exception that occured
        requestId - the id of the request which threw this exception. Should be the equal to the radio ID
